content: materials - 2 different colored skeins of purl soho s super soft merino 1 100% merino each skein is 87 yards/ 100 grams approximately 72 87 yards required per color - us 15 10 mm 16-inch circular needle 2 - a set of us 15 double pointed needles 3 - 1 stitch marker 4 - optional a purl soho pom pom maker set 5 in extra large + jumbo gauge 10 stitches = 4 inches in 1x1 rib relaxed sizes kids adult to fit head sizes up to 20 23 inches in circumference - finished height not including pom pom 9½ 12½ inches - finished circumference relaxed 11 14 inches - pom pom diameter 3½ 4 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/pom-pom-maker-set html
